name: Ted's Quest
description:
Our first Ludum Dare entry. For LD32.

Play as a Ted, the pencil, on a quest to find his girlfriend who has been taken by the evil number LordNein.

Letters are your friends and WEAPONS. Pick them up and throw them at the numbers to kill them. Open the ripped page portal after killing all the numbers and move to the next level.

Note: The game is a little rough around the edges as it was made in under 48 hours. Don't hate.

Made by me and a friend.
